title: Nemesis Q'
body:
Computer working .. check

Currently at 30mins and no match found.. check

 lmfao.. check

replies.body:
It gets old after 3 games. Pretty sure everyone is over it LOL

you play Taric, Soraka, and Nunu and then think: "yeh... im done".

It seems that the true nemesis...
... is Nemesis Draft itself.

In Nemesis it's just basically champs like Nami, Soraka, Taric etc that get picked. Only reason I played it was because it was something new and exciting. But being paired up up with the same champions over and over again... :(.
